plugin_description: Recall - Intelligent Memory Management Plugin. Provides persistent memory, entity tracking, and foreshadowing management for SillyTavern.

memories.title: Memories
memories.auto_record_hint: Memories are recorded automatically during conversations

entities.title: Entities
entities.auto_extract_hint: Entities are extracted automatically during conversations

temporal.title: Temporal Knowledge Graph
temporal.description: Track how facts change over time, support querying historical states by time point/range.
temporal.no_timeline: Enter entity name to query timeline

graph.title: Knowledge Graph
graph.description: Visualize entity relationship network, explore graph traversal and community structure.

episodes.title: Conversation Episodes
episodes.auto_organize_hint: Conversations are automatically organized into episodes

search.title: ğŸ” Advanced Search
search.description: More powerful search capabilities than basic semantic search
search.hint_hybrid: Hybrid search: Combines semantic + fulltext with RRF fusion ranking, best results
search.hint_fulltext: Fulltext search: Exact keyword matching, suitable for specific terms
search.hint_semantic: Semantic search: Understands meaning similarity, suitable for fuzzy queries
search.try_other: Try other keywords or search types

rules.title: ğŸ’¡ About Absolute Rules
rules.description_1: Absolute rules are hard constraints that AI must follow
rules.description_2: Character cards, world settings, writing style should use SillyTavern's built-in features
rules.description_3: This is a supplementary feature not available in ST, used to force AI to follow certain rules
rules.llm_disabled: âš ï¸ LLM not configured, rule detection not active
rules.rules_title: âš ï¸ Absolute Rules (one per line)
rules.rules_hint: These rules will be forcibly injected, AI must follow them. Violations will be detected and warned when saving.
rules.placeholder:
Rules that must not be violated, one per line
Examples:
Character will not actively harm innocent people
Character will not use profanity
Maintain consistency with character settings
Do not use emoji in responses
Do not break the fourth wall

settings.api_url_hint: ğŸ’¡ For remote access, modify to server address (e.g., http://yourdomain:18888)
settings.filter_thinking_hint: Only save AI's final response, not <thinking> content
settings.auto_chunk_hint: Automatically split long responses into multiple memories
settings.max_context_tokens_hint: Adjust according to your AI model. Recommend 1500 for 4K, 3000 for 8K, higher for 128K
settings.inject_position_hint: Recommend 'In chat history', memories blend more naturally into conversation
settings.inject_depth_hint: 0=latest position, 1=after last message, higher numbers = earlier position

embedding.title: ğŸ”— Embedding API Configuration
embedding.description: For semantic search and similarity matching (OpenAI compatible interface)
embedding.model_hint: Fill in API Key and URL, then click refresh button to get available models
embedding.dimension_hint: ğŸ’¡ Enter manually or click 'Test Connection' to auto-detect
embedding.mode_hint: Select Embedding backend, custom API works for proxies etc.
embedding.rate_limit_hint: Limit API call frequency, suitable for free or quota-limited APIs

llm.title: ğŸ¤– LLM API Configuration
llm.description: For foreshadowing analysis, intelligent summarization and other advanced features (optional)
llm.api_key_hint: Supports OpenAI, Claude, SiliconFlow and other LLMs
llm.api_base_hint: Leave empty to use OpenAI official URL

analyzer.title: ğŸ­ Foreshadowing Analyzer Configuration
analyzer.description: Control LLM auto-analysis of foreshadowing (requires LLM API configuration)
analyzer.llm_enabled_hint: When enabled, LLM will automatically analyze foreshadowing during conversations
analyzer.trigger_interval_hint: How many conversation turns between LLM analyses (1=every turn, 10=every 10 turns)
analyzer.auto_plant_hint: Automatically record when LLM detects potential foreshadowing
analyzer.auto_resolve_hint: Automatically mark as resolved when LLM detects foreshadowing payoff

advanced.title: ğŸš€ Advanced Features Configuration (v4.0+)
advanced.description: These are server-side configurations, click 'Save to Server' to apply changes
advanced.temporal_graph_hint: Enable time-dimensional knowledge graph, track entity changes over time
advanced.contradiction_detection_hint: Automatically detect factual conflicts in memories
advanced.entity_summary_hint: Allow LLM to generate description summaries for entities
advanced.retrieval_layers: ğŸ” Retrieval Layer Configuration (11-layer retrieval system)
advanced.l4_entity_hint: Improve retrieval based on entity relevance
advanced.l5_graph_hint: Expand retrieval range through entity relationship graph

capacity.title: ğŸ“Š Capacity Limit Configuration
capacity.description: Control quantity limits, decay and deduplication behavior for contexts and foreshadowing
capacity.context_trigger_interval_hint: How many conversation turns between LLM context extractions
capacity.max_return_hint: Number of foreshadowings injected into context each time
capacity.dedup_embedding_hint: Detect similar content based on Embedding (requires Embedding API)
capacity.high_threshold_hint: â‰¥this value is considered duplicate, auto-skip
capacity.include_recent_hint: Number of recent conversations to inject into context
capacity.proactive_reminder_hint: Important information not mentioned for long will proactively remind AI

tips.title: ğŸ’¡ Usage Tips
tips.tip_1: Make sure Recall service is running
tips.tip_2: Switching characters automatically loads corresponding memories
tips.tip_3: Embedding API is used for semantic search (recommended)
tips.tip_4: LLM API is used for foreshadowing analysis (optional)

messages.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?
messages.confirm_clear: Are you sure you want to clear? This cannot be undone!
messages.connection_failed: Connection failed. Please check the API URL.
